title: Baltimore-Washington Parkway: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety             Safety       For Emergencies, please call the U.S. Park Police dispatch at 202-619-7105  The dedicated force of the United States Park Police patrol the Baltimore-Washington Parkway.  There are no commercial vehicles allowed on the parkway. Please see the Code of Federal Regulations 36 CFR  Vehicles allowed on the parkway are people movers such as buses, taxis, limousines, and mini-buses.  Please remember to obey all posted speed limits.  Note that the speed limit changes from 55 mph to 45 mph from the Route 450 Annapolis Road exit to the Washington, D.C. boundary.              Each year on average, more than 10,000 people die on the road due to drunk driving. In order to stop this deadly epidemic, law enforcement in every state and most U.S. towns and cities will be cracking down on drunk driving from December 12th through January 1st. And they'll see you before you see them. Click here for the Drive Sober or Get Pulled Over website
